definition: measure of length, ten Chinese feet (3.3 m)/to measure/husband/polite appellation for an older male
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
a manly man/a man of character

pinyin: nan2 zi3 han4 da4 zhang4 fu5

definition: no poison, no great man (idiom); A great man has to be ruthless.
A leader can submit or can stand tall as required./ready to give and take/flexible
pinyin: da4 zhang4 fu5 neng2 qu1 neng2 shen1

sentences.english: She is the woman who killed her preacher husband in Tennessee.
sentences.chinese: 之前她在田纳西州杀死了她的传道士丈夫。

sentences.english: Elisa started at the sound of her husband's voice.
sentences.chinese: 听到丈夫的声音，伊利莎吃了一惊。

sentences.english: The hardship of body and mind of man of A phoenix show solicitude for, more help him prostitute of outer call together.
sentences.chinese: 阿凤体恤丈夫身心的辛苦，更帮助他在外召妓。

sentences.english: Her husband, who sells used car parts, has seen his commissions drop.
sentences.chinese: 她的丈夫经销二手次车配件，他的薪酬也下降了。

sentences.english: When I was doing the housework, my husband telephoned me from the office.
sentences.chinese: 当我正在干家务时，我丈夫从办公室打电话给我。

sentences.english: She nursed her husband back to health.
sentences.chinese: 她精心照料丈夫，直到他康复。

sentences.english: But she did not tell her husband Nabal.
sentences.chinese: 这事她却没有告诉丈夫拿八。

sentences.english: She married and divorced twice, stripping both husbands of their cash.
sentences.chinese: 她曾经结婚两次，把两任丈夫的钱全部洗劫了。

sentences.english: Her husband has only been able to find part-time work at a gasoline station.
sentences.chinese: 她的丈夫只能够找到一个加油站兼职工作。

sentences.english: Detective Barton : And yet, you got engaged to the man who murdered your husband.
sentences.chinese: 不一定，你曾经和谋杀你丈夫的人定了婚。

sentences.english: A gulf that seemed unbridgeable was created between husbands and wives at times.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫和妻子之间不时会出现似乎无法逾越的鸿沟。

sentences.english: Laureen approves her husband's political views and once canvassed for him.
sentences.chinese: 她赞同丈夫的政治观点，并亲自开车上阵为丈夫助选。

sentences.english: Laureen approves her husband's political views and once canvassed for him.
sentences.chinese: 她赞同丈夫的政治观点，并亲自开车上阵为丈夫助选。

sentences.english: She leafed through some old magazines while waiting for her husband.
sentences.chinese: 在等她的丈夫时，她翻阅了一些旧杂志。

sentences.english: And BedelL listened as she told him about her brothers and about James.
sentences.chinese: 比德尔也倾听她讲述他的兄弟和丈夫詹姆斯的事。

sentences.english: She hired a detective to shadow her husband.
sentences.chinese: 她雇了私家侦探盯梢她丈夫。
